languages.text: "Мой разум застила мгла... Император, возложи ладонь свою на чела наши и защити от морока ереси!"
"My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay Your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"
languages.original_text: "Мой разум застила мгла... Император, возложи ладонь свою на чела наши и защити от морока ереси!"

traits.locale_text: "My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"

"My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"
"My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"

languages.text: “我的头脑被黑暗所笼罩……帝皇啊，请您把手放在我们的额头上，保护我们免受异端邪说的侵扰！”
languages.original_text: "My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay Your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: “我的头脑被黑暗所笼罩……帝皇啊，请您把手放在我们的额头上，保护我们免受异端邪说的侵扰！”
“我的头脑被黑暗所笼罩……帝皇啊，请您把手放在我们的额头上，保护我们免受异端邪说的侵扰！”

languages.text: « Les ténèbres m'embrouillent l'esprit... Ô Empereur, protégez nos pensées et gardez-nous de l'hérésie ! »
languages.original_text: "My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay Your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: « Les ténèbres m'embrouillent l'esprit... Ô Empereur, protégez nos pensées et gardez-nous de l'hérésie ! »

languages.text: «La oscuridad nubla mi mente... ¡Emperador, pon Tu mano sobre nuestras sienes y protégenos del cieno de la herejía!».
languages.original_text: "My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay Your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: «La oscuridad nubla mi mente... ¡Emperador, pon tu mano sobre nuestras sienes y protégenos del cieno de la herejía!».

languages.text: 「私の心は闇に覆われている…皇帝よ、私たちの眉間に手を置いて、異端の泥沼から私たちをお守りください！」
languages.original_text: "My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay Your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の心は闇に覆われている…皇帝よ、私たちの眉間に手を置いて、異端の泥沼から私たちをお守りください！」
「私の心は闇に覆われている…皇帝よ、私たちの眉間に手を置いて、異端の泥沼から私たちをお守りください！」

languages.text: "Mein Verstand ist durch Dunkelheit getrübt ... Imperator, legt Eure Hand auf unsere Stirn und führt uns gegen den Morast der Ketzerei!"
languages.original_text: "My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay Your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Mein Verstand ist durch Dunkelheit getrübt ... Imperator, legt Eure Hand auf unsere Stirn und führt uns gegen den Morast der Ketzerei!"

languages.original_text: "My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"

languages.text: "Karanlığın gölgesi zihnime çöktü. Ey ulu İmparator, elini alınlarımıza koy ve bizi kâfirlik bataklığından esirge!"
languages.original_text: "My mind is clouded with darkness... Emperor, lay Your hand upon our brows and guard us against the morass of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Karanlığın gölgesi zihnime çöktü. Ey ulu İmparator, elini alınlarımıza koy ve bizi kâfirlik bataklığından esirge!"
